name: Mobile Suit Gundam GQuuuuuuX -Beginning-(2025)
genre: ['Phim Hoạt Hình', 'Phim Hành Động', 'Phim Khoa Học Viễn Tưởng', 'Phim Chính Kịch']
overview: A recap of GQuuuuuuX episodes 1–4. High-school student Amate Yuzuriha lives peacefully in a space colony floating in outer space. But when she meets a war refugee named Nyaan, Amate is drawn into the illegal mobile suit dueling sport known as Clan Battle.
